answerText: pyridine [accept pyridinium or C5H5N or C5H6N+][10] PCC generates an aldehyde from one of these compounds via an oxidation. These compounds can be synthesized in oxymercuration-reduction or hydroboration-oxidation reactions.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | Finals 2 | 14 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: A dimethylamino derivative of this compound is used to convert an acid anhydride to an amide in the Yamaguchi macrolactonization. For 10 points each: [10] Name this compound, a positive ion of which is used in the Corey-Suggs reagent to create an aldehyde.
